title: Irene's Christmas cake
ingredients: ['45g (1 1/2oz) glace cherries', '250 to 340g (9 to 12oz) currants', '250 to 340g (9 to 12oz) sultanas', '45g (1 1/2oz) candied peel', '45g (1 1/2oz) nibbed or chopped almonds (optional)', '3/4 level teaspoon cinnamon', '3/4 level teaspoon mixed spice', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '45g (1 1/2oz) ground almonds', '175g (6oz) cooking margarine', '175g (6oz) caster or soft brown sugar', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '175g (6oz) plain flour', '50g (2oz) of rum', '2 teaspoons treacle']
